GameData\Squad\Contracts\Contracts.cfg

If you are able to do this with ModuleManager (I don't remember the format of the config file right now), then you should definitely do it that way instead of modifying a Squad base file. That's something you should only do if there's no other option. And as a bonus: the ModuleManager config can be ported to future installations, saving you the trouble of having to do it (and remember how to do it) all over again every time.
